author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Okay, what is actually happening right now??? 

So many positive changes and blessings coming in. 

I don't have the words right now.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Anyone else struggle with clothe shopping? 😅😂

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Aight, let's get to work!

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Life is so strange.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Getting an email telling your parcel will be handled by DHL or as I like to call them Drop it, Hide it, Lose it...

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Thank you for your overwhelming support in the run up to Colourblind. Tickets have sold faster than I ever could have imagined. It's insane. https://t.co/AjZibgpOXB

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: The most toxic relationship I have is the one I share with Chess 😂

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
So, for a third time, one of locks has broke in my flat and my flatmate says he was almost locked in the bathroom.

Why is our flat so keen to lock us in various rooms?!? 😂😂

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Been quietly writing this for the last 6 months but it's ready to unveil today. 

"Colourblind" is now on sale. To be performed at @music_sua 11/04/22 at 6 and 8pm.

"Someone's always there to help. A story of change." https://t.co/Iqx6VFJVr9

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Owl-nouncement imminent! Watch this space! https://t.co/JtpEO65DaF

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Love it when things just work ...

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Anyone got £650,000 for a flat in London? Asking for a friend lol 😂

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: The creative world gets smaller and smaller all the time 😅😂

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Okay, I think it's done now 😅😂 https://t.co/LpFrU6Oe9h

author: Christopher Callaghan

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Finished my first full script today. 

I can't stop thinking about it. 

I can't wait to unveil it.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
"What's that song that wishes people a merry Christmas and a happy new year?" -me 

"We wish you a merry Christmas and a happy new year" -flatmate

"..." -me

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Merry Christmas and a happy holiday season to everyone! ✨

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Gonna start tweeting here again. Get some practice in before I have a lot more free time on my hands... 🙈

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Your talent, creativity and passion for musical theatre will only take you beyond your wildest dreams. The world has big things planned for you. Just you wait. Just you wait ✨ (2/2)

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Bonding with my dear friend and flatmate over the arts and our extra work and all our projects we've been involved in. Been especially fun being able to spot ourselves in TV shows and films.

If you see this, I have huge amounts of respect for you pal. (1/2)

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Being unemployed for 18 months then landing a new job and getting a promotion in 2 weeks. Feels good 😜

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Was feeling brave. Put @Hamilton on shuffle and got hit by "Dear Theodosia" and then "It's quiet uptown" back to back 😭😭😭

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Being given an opportunity to do something I love. All I can think of after waiting so long to jump back in the theatre is that "I won't throw away my shot."

Watch this space 😉

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Lining up lots of creative work and projects that have been put off due to Covid. 

Planning out my year this year has only gotten me excited.

I'm so ready to get back in the theatre.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Women 💜

author: Christopher Callaghan
text:
Imagine completing a section on a application form and clicking done to move on and you have to do that entire section again. 

I had typed out every answer as this was the questions part of the application form...

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Can we all just follow lockdown guidelines until this is over? Then we can all go out, see loved ones and enjoy life again. Angry and disappointed at those who selfishly break rules and guidelines.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: We should remember this for when we next have a general election. #whatatwat

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: What a confusing bumbling twat of a man.

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Goodnight world. May you shine as bright as all the stars in the sky. ✨

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: I scream for I do not know https://t.co/YIFzLImu0f

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: The UK is fucked. If it wasn't due to the pandemic it sure is now. Nice one Boris 👍

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Can't convince stupid they're stupid. Does that make me stupid for trying? 🤔

author: Christopher Callaghan
text: Doesn't music hit different at 3am?
